001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.NumberTypeAgnostic;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
006
007import java.util.List;
008
009@Strategy(Strategy.Role.INTERFACE)
010public interface BasisFunction<N extends Number> extends NumberTypeAgnostic<N> {
011
012    N apply(N input);
013
014    interface Generator<N extends Number> extends NumberTypeAgnostic<N> {
015
016        FeatureExtractor<N> generate(int featureCount);
017
018    }
019
020    @Strategy(Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
021    class FeatureExtractor<N extends Number> implements net.tvburger.jdl.linear.FeatureExtractor<N> {
022
023        private final List<BasisFunction<N>> basis;
024        private final JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport;
025
026        public FeatureExtractor(List<BasisFunction<N>> basis, JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
027            this.basis = basis;
028            this.typeSupport = typeSupport;
029        }
030
031        @Override
032        public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getTypeSupport() {
033            return typeSupport;
034        }
035
036        /**
037         * {@inheritDoc}
038         */
039        public N[] extractFeatures(N input) {
040            int m = basis.size();
041            N[] features = typeSupport.createArray(m);
042            for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
043                features[i] = basis.get(i).apply(input);
044            }
045            return features;
046        }
047
048        /**
049         * {@inheritDoc}
050         */
051        public int featureCount() {
052            return basis.size();
053        }
054
055    }
056}
